content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court case heard at the district court in ljubljana the judgment was issued on august 22 2022 and the plaintiff incurred costs of 348387 eur but it is not specified who will bear these costs the case involved the division of goods between two exspouses with a total value of 10000000 eur one of the assets being divided is a real estate property located in ljubljana and both parties will receive an equal share the specific laws used in the decision are family code sections 67 and 73 the court ruled that the property belongs to the plaintiff as coowned property and ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiffs legal costs the text also mentions that the plaintiff is requesting the court to declare an apartment as joint property and to reimburse the costs of the proceedings while the defendant contests the application and claims to be the rightful owner the court found that the apartment was acquired during the marriage and should be considered coowned property and the defendant failed to prove otherwise the court also considered the contributions of each spouse and awarded the plaintiff half of the property the text concludes by explaining the process of appealing a judgment which must be done within 30 days of receiving a written copy of the judgment and submitted to the ljubljana high court
